alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN INDIANA AND CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 931 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Reynoldsville to 6 miles east of Punxsutawney. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reynoldsville, Brockway, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Big Run, Rossiter, and Anita. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 82 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
